Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-59466 affecting package nodejs for versions less than 20.14.0-11
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-59466 affecting package nodejs for versions less than 20.14.0-11. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package nodejs is earlier than 20.14.0-11, affected by CVE-2025-59466
